mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_NO ,b.TITLE ,b.WRITER ,b.REGDATE ,b.VIEW_COUNT ,b.TEAM ,NVL(f.COUNT,0) COUNT FROM (SELECT b.BOARD_NO ,b.TITLE ,m.NAME WRITER ,b.REGDATE ,b.VIEW_COUNT ,m.TEAM FROM BOARD b,MEMBER m WHERE m.ID=b.WRITER) b , (SELECT TYPE_NO ,COUNT(*) COUNT FROM FILES WHERE TYPE = 'N' AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY TYPE_NO ) f WHERE b.BOARD_NO= f.TYPE_NO(+) ORDER BY 1 DESC
SELECT b.BOARD_NO ,b.TITLE ,m.NAME writer ,b.CONTENT contentBlob ,b.UPDATE_DATE ,b.REGDATE ,m.PHONE ,m.ID ,b.VIEW_COUNT FROM BOARD b,MEMBER m WHERE m.ID=b.WRITER AND b.BOARD_NO=#{boardNo}

SELECT b.BOARD_NO ,b.TITLE ,b.WRITER ,b.REGDATE ,b.VIEW_COUNT ,b.TEAM ,NVL(f.COUNT,0) COUNT FROM (SELECT b.BOARD_NO ,b.TITLE ,m.NAME writer ,b.REGDATE ,b.CONTENT ,b.VIEW_COUNT ,m.TEAM FROM BOARD b,MEMBER m WHERE m.ID=b.WRITER
AND team = #{team}
AND
title Like '%'||#{word}||'%'
dbms_lob.instr(content, utl_raw.CAST_TO_RAW(#{word}), 1, 1) > 0
name Like '%'||#{word}||'%'
) b, (SELECT TYPE_NO ,COUNT(*) COUNT FROM FILES WHERE TYPE = 'N' AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY TYPE_NO ) f WHERE b.BOARD_NO= f.TYPE_NO(+) ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT b.BOARD_NO ,b.TITLE ,b.WRITER ,b.REGDATE ,b.VIEW_COUNT ,b.TEAM ,NVL(f.COUNT,0) COUNT FROM (SELECT b.BOARD_NO ,b.TITLE ,m.NAME writer ,b.REGDATE ,b.VIEW_COUNT ,m.TEAM FROM BOARD b,MEMBER m WHERE m.ID=b.WRITER AND m.TEAM = #{team})b, (SELECT TYPE_NO ,COUNT(*) COUNT FROM FILES WHERE TYPE = 'N' AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY TYPE_NO ) f WHERE b.BOARD_NO= f.TYPE_NO(+) ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT b.BOARD_NO ,b.TITLE ,b.WRITER ,b.REGDATE ,b.TEAM ,NVL(f.COUNT,0) COUNT FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO ,TITLE ,WRITER ,TEAM ,REGDATE FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO ,TITLE ,WRITER ,TEAM ,ROWNUM r ,REGDATE FROM (SELECT b.BOARD_NO ,b.TITLE ,m.NAME writer ,m.TEAM ,b.REGDATE FROM deploy.BOARD b,deploy.MEMBER m WHERE m.ID=b.WRITER ORDER BY 1 DESC)) WHERE r BETWEEN 1 and 5) b , (SELECT TYPE_NO ,COUNT(*) COUNT FROM FILES WHERE TYPE = 'N' AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY TYPE_NO ) f WHERE b.BOARD_NO= f.TYPE_NO(+) ORDER BY 1 DESC
